name: Pong (itch) (Mauricio Camargo Santos)
description:
My take on the pong game. With options for two players or play against th e AI.

Press the space bar after a point to start the round.

There are some powerups which will make you small, larger, or make the ball go faster and one that will assure your victory.

The power ups apply to the last player that touched the ball.

SFX and music from:

https://freesound.org/home/login/?next=/home/
